channel.title: Need iron/cobble
channel.description:
I need people who are willing to trade iron/cobble, I'm willing to give them the following resources.
Gun powder/TNT Bones Feathers Arrows Webs/bows
All drops from mobs, gun powder being the trickiest to obtain for most. You can trade any amount of iron/cobble.

item.title: Need iron/cobble
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Nothing, I’ll give you some for free

Read full topic
